thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com
thread.title: Kim Mulligan

author: Kim Mulligan
title: Kim Mulligan
text:
Dear Lynn and Firmoo; So unexpected and kind of you! Why would I shop anywhere else with customer service like I have had from you from beginning to the end. I've never experienced a company like yours in 56 years. I so look forward to my next glasses and even more the ones I, my family and friends will buy from you in the future. I will be telling everyone I know about your outstanding customer service In fact it has already begun! I will rave and rave about you! I am officially IMPRESSED!
Thank you so very much! Kim M.
